title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AMLast edit: June 08, 2023, 01:58:31 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: Hello bitcoin lovers, may I ask some questions about bitcoin?  Feel free to suggest some adding of more questions- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin? - What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I don´t keep any information for some work or anything, I just want to hear out other people´s bitcoin journey

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: June 08, 2023, 10:31:03 AMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 06:39:00 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: My replies - When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?Mid 2019. I started first at Localbitcoins to get some money from a country to another. and I was so nervous first that it was not legit but when I saw it was so easy, smooth and legitI was like "FUCK why did i not find this stuff out before? I could be rich today!!"     - What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?I haven´t really used bitcoin as investment yet, I holding some BTC now that i bought when it was at 17K and that would be my best investment.But I p2p trade a lot and the money I have made from that would count as the best investment/deal I made concern bitcoin.- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Yes! I bought food sometimes In the town where I live you can buy BTC for cash IRL without any KYC. They have BTC coffee shops and BTC massage salon.- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?I use it almost daily for p2p trading.- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I have no idea! But I really hope so, but if I need to think I don´t think so, some governments really dislike this with crypto currency.- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?The best thing is I would say possibility to making money without a government and bank watching you.   The worst thing is all the scammers around on the p2p websites  - Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?Yes I think online casino will start to using crypto more and more, since it´s get more easier to use and easier to get, and as you see crypto currency business companies is shownmore and more on t.e.x as football teams sponsorships and that will make more "normal people" to start using it. - Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?Easy answer yes. I could say that I did not invest and bought a lot 2019 and sold when it was at 65k a couple years ago.But I did not have the money at the time.- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?I meet so many new friends online from p2p trading and my eyes have opened for a whole new world.From being skeptical at first to love it. But I still have so much to learn and I learning every day more and more, this forum is a great platform to learn more about all crypto currency´s.  - And for last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I don´t think it will explode! But around 30K but if i need to say a number I would say 32K.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?Some time in 2016! Before that I just earned it through small side hustles I had alongside every life.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?Buying in 2016, that did well for me in 2017! I think the next best deal will be everything until the next halving effectQuote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Not yet but I look forward to one day making a purchase with it for something special or meaningful to make that day memorable. Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Trading. Sending: I use it to transact with friends overseas. Also earning, business. It makes being connected to the world of business much easier, sometimes without even intention!Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I believe we are past the point of doubting whether or not it will be here forever or not. I believe it will be here forever, and possibly will be marked in our history books. Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?Best: DecentralizationWorst: Miner and whale market manipulation, and scams because of transactions being irreversible.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?Not if they continue on their current path - being losing business because of unreasonable KYC requests. Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?Only that I did not buy a lot more when I first found out about it Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.It lead me to realize the problems with the current system. This was quite an enlightening and long-term experience!Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?...and of course met many new like-minded, great people! Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- And for last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?$15-$45k. I have big expectations for 2024 though!

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Not exactly the same questions though but I think this thread woul be of help to you.[Interviews] with Bitcointalk members by @zasad@It has the replies o fsome bitcoin Ogs, it's definitely an interesting thread to read through.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on June 08, 2023, 11:13:03 AMNot exactly the same questions though but I think this thread woul be of help to you.[Interviews] with Bitcointalk members by @zasad@It has the replies o fsome bitcoin Ogs, it's definitely an interesting thread to read through.Yes I have seen it also  Its very good.Thanks for your answers BenCodie

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AMHello bitcoin lovers, may I ask some questions about bitcoin?  You can go on with your question but some sensitive aspect of the questions may not received response for privacy sake, moreover your questions are much as well, i wonder which field is your specifications or the profession you have chosen by asking this much Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?Can't remember but all i know is that am not part of the early adopters of bitcoin, i fall in to the category  the new era of bitcoin users. Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Am yet but have made alot of online transactions through making payments in bitcoin for the things i purchased Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Investment and trading, i hodl some on my cold storage while the little portion on the exchange for trading.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?Bitcoin has come to stay, adoption is ever increasing, you will have to understand that it's a form of money we can use to buy and sell, just that it appears in a digital form, it's already dominating the world and the fiat financial economy.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- And for last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?You'd rather put it like this that the worth of bitcoin with respect to USD, before the end of this year, we are more likely to arrived at the all time high of $68,000 because the more we are getting closer to next year halving which will set in for another new all time high.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Quote- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin? My first purchase was way back 2015 or 2016 can't actually recall.Quote- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Not directly, almost all our house hold appliances are bought from Bitcoin conversion to fiat.Quote- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Pay bills, buy things that I found interesting.  I use Bitcoin almost every time I find an opportunity to spend it but monthly the least.Quote- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I wish Bitcoin will stay forever but I also believe that nothing last in this world.  Quote- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?The best thing with Bitcoin is to be able to transfer fund boundlessly, the worst is the uncontrollable network congestion and transaction fee surge.Quote- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?I do think that Bitcoin and sports book is one of the futures of online gambling but I guess there will be more than just Bitcoin in the gambling industry.Quote- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?NoneQuote- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?Economic inclusion, since I am able to participate in global trade with the use of Bitcoin.  I also meet some friends because of my involvement with Bitcoin.Quote- And for last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?This might be speculation at its best but I think Bitcoin will be around $40k+ at the end of the year.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?2014Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?In January 2019, I sold my beloved camera for USD $250. I then used $200 to purchase BTC (Bitcoin) and the remaining amount to treat my family to our favorite meals. At that time, I was eager to apply the theory of forgetting about an asset after purchasing it. So, I left it untouched until mid-2019, around June or July, only to discover that the price of BTC had dramatically increased by 80%. It felt like a stroke of luck, as I received unexpected financial gains, even though I hadn't anticipated it, since I already had sufficient savings at that time.I felt incredibly fortunate to enjoy such a high percentage of profit, even though the actual amount wasn't substantial.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?I once purchased a VPS (Virtual Private Server) for digital goods and bought a headset for tangible items.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Since I bought and held onto it for a long time, I suppose I could consider it as a long-term investment. So, I didn't use Bitcoin for everyday transactions.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?In my opinion, the best thing about it is its limited supply and the incredibly large community surrounding it. However, the downside is that not many people understand Bitcoin, and the transaction fees are still dynamic.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Are you indirectly wants to get information on your bitcoin survey?You would have made it clear as a survey and a statistical data collection for members over here to see their overall usage and performance on their bitcoin involvement. There is not wrong though but I think you making it open would had been more better.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?I really need to give thanks to bitcoin in 2021, because in 2021 I got many job because of Bitcoin, main thing is the raise of the price. It makes me so many jobs, especially for  AmbassadorQuote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I think everyone knows about Bitcoin halving on 2024, so I think bitcoin price will raise up 2 times from current price.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?Yes I have some regrets involving bitcoin, and the most regretful moment is when I have considered that Bitcoin will be a great in a near future. And you know what? I already knew about Bitcoin in 2016, I really want to buy some Bitcoin at that moment, But I don't have some money to buy it. So at the time that I was involved in bitcoin but I don't really involving fully (Buy some BTC) it really makes me regretful.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?- The best thing with bitcoin is all about the Decentralize, and the Blockchain.- The worst thing with bitcoin is about the wallet, if I just made a mistake by let someone knows about my seedphrase/passphrase, it will be the worst thing I've done I think, even if I didn't know that someone already know/see/record it.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I think bitcoin will be always stay around forever, and you ask how long will it be with us? the answer is until the Doomsday/Armagedon/Judgement Day come. Trust me, Bitcoin will never Die. Hope that answer could be the answer of everyone, regarding to your question. Btw, I think this question is proper to be the last question.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: I've done the interview in the thread zasad@ created and @Cantsay has attached the thread probably all should know about interviews and experience with bitcoin and more should be in there.I'm not going to give another opinion here as it gets there, although there are a few differences from the question.

comments.author: PIMPdev
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AMHello bitcoin lovers, may I ask some questions about bitcoin?  Feel free to suggest some adding of more questions- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin? - What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I don´t keep any information for some work or anything, I just want to hear out other people´s bitcoin journey1. In 20202. When I bought it below $20k a few months ago.3. No, and I don't think I will4. I'm not using it, only buying and holding.5. Nothing lasts forever. But BTC is here and will be for a long time.6. The best? It's anonymous and no one can stop me from using it. Worst? I guess fees and sometimes transaction time.7. To be honest I don't know what to say about that, never did any of those things.8. I have 0 regrets at this point.9. Nothing really interesting. I don't talk about it much, none of my friends are in crypto at all and I haven't sold any Bitcoin to buy something big like a house or a car yet.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: What is your main purpose in asking these questions? This kind of interview has already been done by @zasad as mentioned by @Cantsay above. But he sent several private messages to conduct several interviews that will eventually be recorded for forum data.Before asking these questions to others, it is advisable for you to answer these questions personally. So that we also know your journey with Bitcoin and how far you have known it.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AMHello bitcoin lovers, may I ask some questions about bitcoin?  Feel free to suggest some adding of more questions- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?I purchased Bitcoin for first time in 2016 and I believe that it was a great decision back then. Quote- What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?I would keep that thing secret because I don't feel the urge to answer that question due to privacy concerns.Quote- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?I have never bought any physical thing with Bitcoin, and I will prefer to let my purchases be digital items only.Quote- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?I use Bitcoin for trading purpose mainly and sometimes I use it to purchase digital goods. I use it very often in my daily life, but only for trading purpose.Quote- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I think it will stay around forever with us because it's quite useful and has given enough opportunities to many people and businesses.Quote- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?The best thing with Bitcoin is its decentralized nature and because of that we can transfer it without any restrictions from centralized bodies. I have not found a worst thing about Bitcoin yet and I believe there isn't a worse thing about it.Quote- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?Yes, I do think that Bitcoin casinos are going to be the future of online gambling and I believe that they already are doing their operations in the best way possible. In future I believe that many new Bitcoin casinos will be there and most of the existing ones might quit their services.Quote- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?I never regret on my decision of learning and incorporating Bitcoin in my life and any involvement with it, I only regret that why I didn't found this amazing innovation in its initial days.Quote- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?I have found some good friends only because of Bitcoin and that's one of the best things that happened to me because of Bitcoin. I'm truly thankful to it and to its creator.Quote- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I'm sure enough that Bitcoin's price at 31st December 2023 will be over $40k and I expect even more than that. I have answered all of your questions and I don't think that anything is wrong with those questions. I hope you may find my answers helpful. I would like to ask you a question. Are you asking this questions as a survey or something similar or your are just asking the questions out of curiosity?

comments.author: Rupok
comments.body: Some positive changes in my life have happened through Bitcoin.  I earned my first bitcoin of 2017 from this forum.  I have bought many things with bitcoins mobile laptop, computer and I run my own expenses with bitcoins.I usually use Bitcoin to earn money.  I love Bitcoin as one of the easiest ways to earn money.  Day by day the country is becoming digital and people's financial transactions are now becoming digital.Bitcoin has been around as a digital currency for many years, so I think Bitcoin will last forever.  The best thing about Bitcoin is that you can get good profit with little investment.The worst thing with Bitcoin is transaction fee, because Bitcoin is now very transaction fee.  Already Bitcoin exists in casinos and sports booking platforms.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: June 08, 2023, 02:57:43 PMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 04:56:57 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: taufik123 on June 08, 2023, 02:16:24 PMWhat is your main purpose in asking these questions? This kind of interview has already been done by @zasad as mentioned by @Cantsay above. But he sent several private messages to conduct several interviews that will eventually be recorded for forum data.Before asking these questions to others, it is advisable for you to answer these questions personally. So that we also know your journey with Bitcoin and how far you have known it. I already answered them. No purpose at all. Just want to learn people better and it's fun to know other people's bitcoin experience. If people don't want to answer they shouldn't

comments.author: DannyHamilton
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?I don't remember the exact date. I think it was sometime in 2012, or perhaps early 2013?Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?Acquire Bitcoin whenever I have some extra funds available. None are any better or worse than any other. Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Yes.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What do you normally use bitcoin for?Saving for the future. Paying my monthly satellite TV bill. Purchasing items online. Pizza from the local Pizzaria. Paying friends and/or family.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Every month. Usually a few times in a month.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?Nothing lasts forever.  Forever is a VERY long time. Bitcoin will probably be around for at least a few more decades. Maybe even a century or a few.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing with bitcoin?Decentralization.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?Technical barriers to entry.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?Not until it becomes a bigger part of everyday use for the average person.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?I wish I was braver in the beginning.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin?I've learned a lot about cryptography and security.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?I wouldn't be surprised if it was as low as $3,000. I also wouldn't be surprised if it was as high as $200,000. Anything less than $3,000 or more than $200,000 would surprise me.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 08, 2023, 10:30:44 AM- When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin? - What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?- What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?- Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.   Maybe you have meet some new friends thanks to bitcoin or got a new job you enjoy?- And last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?1. I have purchased way back 2016 but not really that much for about $4002. I have just been accumulating Bitcoin 3. Wallet steam keys used on Dota 24. Not that much, im accumulating holding for long term5. There's no such thing about being forever6. Best thing? Anonymous, decentralized, p2p transactions, earning opportunity. Flaws? Scalability7. No it wont but it would serve out different market8. No regrets but rather im thankful9. I do able to make improve my financial status because of Bitcoin. I do make out more income which is more than sufficient on day to day living10. No one knows about price predictions. Its always been a random thing.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Hello bitcoin lovers.Thanks for all the cool replies it´s fun to see other bitcoin journeys!  Wish everyone on the forum all bitcoin and  investment & trading luck for the future.

comments.author: KaosanRoad
comments.body: - When was the first time you ever purchased some bitcoin?I still did not buy bitcoin, some friends told me its good investment idea so I check this forum and learn little bit and later I will buy. - What is your best bitcoin investment or deal you made so far?Still not buy any bitcoin- Have you bought any physical things/items with bitcoin?Still not buy any bitcoin- What do you normally use bitcoin for? and how often do you use bitcoin in your daily life?Still not buy any bitcoin- Do you think bitcoin will stay around forever or how long will it be with us?I don´t know really, but someone said nothing good last forever. but I don´t think so because its many that is against bitcoin like goverments - What is the best thing with bitcoin? & What is the worst thing with bitcoin?I think the best thing is that you get some privacy and freedom with your own moneyand maybe the worst thing is that many bitcoin go to terroists - Do you think bitcoin casino & sports booking will be the future of online gambling and taking over the market a lot more then it already has?I have no idea about this, i am to new in the bitcoin world. but why not?- Do you have any regrets involving bitcoin?not yet.. but maybe later.- What is the best thing that has happened to you thanks to bitcoin? expect of making profit in term of money.I come in to this forum and i reading everyday to learn myself new things.- And for last what do you think bitcoin will be worth in USD 31th December 2023?$29.990Thanks for let me reply
